member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketEntry
member.summary: The https://www.cardmarket.com/ information for a given card.
member.remarks: All prices are in Euros.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketEntry.Url
member.summary: The URL to the cardmarket store page to purchase this card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketEntry.UpdatedAt
member.summary: A date that the price was last updated. In the format of YYYY/MM/DD

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketEntry.Prices
member.summary: Price information for the card.
member.remarks: All prices are in Euros.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice
member.summary: Price information for a card.
member.remarks: All prices are in Euros.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.AverageSellPrice
member.summary: The average sell price as shown in the chart at the website for non-foils.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.LowPrice
member.summary: The lowest price at the market for non-foils.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.TrendPrice
member.summary: The trend price as shown at the website (and in the chart) for non-foils.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.GermanProLow
member.summary: The lowest sell price from German professional sellers.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.SuggestedPrice
member.summary: A suggested sell price for professional users, determined by an internal algorithm; this algorithm is controlled by cardmarket, not this API.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.ReverseHoloSell
member.summary: The average sell price as shown in the chart at the website for reverse holos.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.ReverseHoloLow
member.summary: The lowest price at the market as shown at the website (for condition EX+) for reverse holos.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.ReverseHoloTrend
member.summary: The trend price as shown at the website (and in the chart) for reverse holos.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.LowPriceExPlus
member.summary: The lowest price at the market for non-foils with condition EX or better.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.AverageDay
member.summary: The average sale price over the last day.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.AverageWeek
member.summary: The average sale price over the last 7 days.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.AverageMonth
member.summary: The average sale price over the last 30 days.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.AverageDayReverseHolo
member.summary: The average sale price over the last day for reverse holos.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.AverageWeekReverseHolo
member.summary: The average sale price over the last 7 days for reverse holos.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cardmarket.CardmarketPrice.AverageMonthReverseHolo
member.summary: The average sale price over the last 30 days for reverse holos.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Ability
member.summary: One or more abilities for a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Ability.Name
member.summary: The name of the ability.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Ability.Text
member.summary: The text value of the ability.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Ability.Type
member.summary: The type of the ability, such as Ability or Pokémon-Power.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.AncientTrait
member.summary: The ancient trait for a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.AncientTrait.Name
member.summary: The name of the ancient trait.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.AncientTrait.Text
member.summary: The text value of the ancient trait.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Attack
member.summary: One or more attacks for a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Attack.Costs
member.summary: The cost of the attack represented by a list of energy types.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Attack.Name
member.summary: The name of the attack.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Attack.Text
member.summary: The text or description associated with the attack.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Attack.Damage
member.summary: The damage amount of the attack.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Attack.ConvertedEnergyCost
member.summary: The total cost of the attack. For example, if it costs 2 fire energy, the converted energy cost is simply 2.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card
member.summary: Represents a single Pokémon card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Name
member.summary: The name of the card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Supertype
member.summary: The supertype of the card, such as Pokémon, Energy, or Trainer.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Subtypes
member.summary: A list of subtypes, such as Basic, EX, Mega, Rapid Strike, etc.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Level
member.summary: The level of the card. This only pertains to cards from older sets and those of supertype Pokémon.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Hitpoints
member.summary: The hit points of the card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Types
member.summary: The energy types for a card, such as Fire, Water, Grass, etc.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.EvolvesFrom
member.summary: Which Pokémon this card evolves from.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.EvolvesTo
member.summary: Which Pokémon this card evolves to.
member.remarks: Can be multiple, for example, Eeve, which has multiple evolutions.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Rules
member.summary: Any rules associated with the card. For example, VMAX rules, Mega rules, or various trainer rules.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.AncientTrait
member.summary: The ancient trait for a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Abilities
member.summary: One or more abilities for a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Attacks
member.summary: One or more attacks for a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Weakness
member.summary: One or more weaknesses for a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Resistances
member.summary: One or more resistances for a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.RetreatCosts
member.summary: A list of costs it takes to retreat and return the card to your bench. Each cost is an energy type, such as Water or Fire.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.ConvertedRetreatCost
member.summary: The converted retreat cost for a card is the count of energy types found within the retreatCost field. For example, ["Fire", "Water"] has a converted retreat cost of 2.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Set
member.summary: The set details embedded into the card.
member.remarks: See the object for more details.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Number
member.summary: The number of the card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Artist
member.summary: The artist of the card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Rarity
member.summary: The rarity of the card, such as "Common" or "Rare Rainbow".

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.FlavorText
member.summary: The flavor text of the card. This is the text that can be found on some Pokémon cards that is usually italicized near the bottom of the card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.NationalPokedexNumbers
member.summary: The national pokedex numbers associated with any Pokémon featured on a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Legalities
member.summary: The legalities for a given card.
member.remarks: A legality will not be present in the if it is not legal. If it is legal or banned, it will be present.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Card.Images
member.summary: The images for a card.

member.summary: The https://www.tcgplayer.com information for a given card.
member.remarks: All prices are in US Dollars.
See the object for more details.

member.remarks: All prices are in Euros.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.CardImages.SmallImageUrl
member.summary: A smaller, lower-res image for a card.
member.remarks: This is a URL.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.CardImages.LargeImageUrl
member.summary: A larger, higher-res image for a card.
member.remarks: This is a URL.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Legalities
member.summary: The legalities for a given card.
member.remarks: A legality will not be present in the if it is not legal. If it is legal or banned, it will be present.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Legalities.Standard
member.summary: The legality ruling for Standard. Can be either Legal, Banned, or not present.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Legalities.Expanded
member.summary: The legality ruling for Expanded. Can be either Legal, Banned, or not present.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.Legalities.Unlimited
member.summary: The legality ruling for Unlimited. Can be either Legal, Banned, or not present.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.WeaknessOrResistance
member.summary: Weakness or Resistance for a given card.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.WeaknessOrResistance.Type
member.summary: The type of weakness or resistance, such as Fire or Water.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Cards.WeaknessOrResistance.Value
member.summary: The value of the weakness or resistance.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.FetchableApiObject
member.summary: Base class being used for any objects of the API, which can be fetched.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.IApiObjectWithId
member.summary: Represents an object from the API which supports an id.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.IApiObjectWithId.Id
member.summary: String representation of the objects id.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set
member.summary: Represents a set of Pokémon .

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set.Name
member.summary: The name of the set.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set.Series
member.summary: The series the set belongs to, like Sword and Shield or Base.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set.PrintedTotal
member.summary: The number printed on the card that represents the total.
member.remarks: This total does not include secret rares.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set.Total
member.summary: The total number of cards in the set, including secret rares, alternate art, etc.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set.Legalities
member.summary: The legalities for a given card.
member.remarks: A legality will not be present in the if it is not legal. If it is legal or banned, it will be present.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set.PtcgoCode
member.summary: The code the Pokémon Trading Card Game Online uses to identify a set.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set.ReleaseDate
member.summary: The date the set was released (in the USA). Format is YYYY/MM/DD.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set.UpdatedAt
member.summary: The date and time the set was updated. Format is YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:SS.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.Set.Images
member.summary: Any images associated with the set, such as symbol and logo.

member.name: T:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.SetImages
member.summary: Any images associated with the set, such as symbol and logo.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.SetImages.SymbolImageUrl
member.summary: The url to the symbol image.

member.name: P:PokemonTcgSdkV2.Api.Sets.SetImages.LogoImageUrl
member.summary: The url to the logo image.
